javascript.title: Understanding Closures
javascript.content: Closures allow a function to access variables from an enclosing scope or environment.

javascript.title: Async Await in JavaScript
javascript.content: Async await makes asynchronous code look more like synchronous code.

reactjs.title: React Hooks
reactjs.content: Hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features without writing a class.

reactjs.title: React Context API
reactjs.content: Context provides a way to pass data through the component tree without having to pass props down manually at every level.
